topic.fullpath: Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Artificial Intelligence :: Machine Learning

name: Fast Compressed Neural Networks
short_description:
FCNN (Fast Compressed Neural Networks) is a free open source C++ library for artificial neural network computations. It is easy to use and extend, written in modern C++ and is very fast. All FCNN classes are templated to support both single and double precision
computations. Internal representation of network in FCNN differs from all other libraries allowing true code modularisation with simultaneous speed improvements.
summary: A C++ library for artificial neural network computations
